channel.title: MultiROM
channel.description: Status of the MultiROM for flo

item.title: MultiROM for flo was released
item.description: So, here we go: MultiROM v15 for flo was released.

item.title: Status update
item.description: Right now, most of MultiROM changes I wanted to do are complete and the kernel patch for flo is working.

item.title: The flo arrives!
item.description: My new Nexus 7 has just arrived from the UK.

item.title: The campaign is funded!
item.description: It's done! After 24 days, the campaign is now fully funded. Thank you all very much for your contributions and support.
